resources.string:
Some hints
 You can tap on:
 ･ the loudspeaker icon to toggle the TTGO beep
 ･ the battery icon to get precise charge level indication
 ･ the sonde or target icons to launch Google Maps in navigation mode
 ･ the sonde ID to show the radiosondy.info or Sondehub page for the sonde
 ･ the landing zone (orange circle) to get Google maps directions to the predicted landing site
 ･ the explosion icon to get the time of the (predicted or actual) burst local time
 ･ the menu icon to show the menu and the sonde coordinates
 ･ the latitude (or longitude) of the sonde to copy it to the clipboard

 Long tap on:
 ･ the car menu item to chose the navigation app to bring you to the sonde current position
 ･ the sonde or target icons to choose a navigation app that will guide you there
 ･ any other menu item to get an explanation of what it does
 ･ the latitude or longitude of the sonde to copy both coordinates to the clipboard
